Summary User experience is key in the success of a product, technology or service. I have used my scientific and business knowledge to garner myself in the technology and development setting, providing meaningful results for customers within my work group. I have become known as the go-to person for projects that drive efficiency and for daily strategic planning for my team. I have always loved challenges, which is why I am pursuing my Masters of Science in Engineering and Technology Management, focusing on New Product Development.  
 
In my time at Intel I have had the pleasure of working with many great engineers to solve complex manufacturing issues related to making microprocessors.
